pageTitle: Tell us why you cannot confirm this claim
h1: Tell us why you cannot confirm this claim

sw.p1: For example, %s could be claiming for too many or too few days of support.

tw.p1: For example, %s could be claiming for too many or too few days of travel, or they might not have been in work for one of the days they are claiming for.

p2: You need to make sure you provide enough information, so %s understands what needs to be updated.

validation.required: Enter a reason why you cannot confirm this claim
validation.tooLong: Reason why you cannot confirm this claim must be 300 characters or fewer
